reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and engaging. His lectures are well-organized, but he can be a bit strict on deadlines.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is amazing! She explains concepts clearly and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is decent, but his lectures can be a bit dry. You have to put in extra effort to do well.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is fantastic! Her classes are interactive, and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's classes are difficult to follow, and he is not very approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor is a great lecturer, but the workload is heavy. Make sure to stay on top of the readings.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows his stuff, but his grading is tough. Participation is key in his classes.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is the best! She makes difficult topics easy to understand and is very supportive.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is very knowledgeable, but his teaching style is hard to follow. Exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Thomas is a great professor, but the assignments can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. White is an excellent teacher. He makes the subject interesting and is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Art
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is good, but her lectures can be a bit monotonous. The material is interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very disorganized, and his exams are unfair. I would not recommend taking his class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Rodriguez is very passionate about her subject. The class is challenging, but you learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is one of the best professors I’ve had. He’s approachable, and his lectures are very engaging.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is tough. The workload is heavy, and her grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is a great professor, but his exams are difficult. Make sure to attend his office hours.

reviews.subject: Theater
reviews.review: Prof. Allen is okay, but her lectures are not very engaging. The material is interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. King is an amazing professor! His lectures are clear, and he genuinely cares about his students' success.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Wright is very knowledgeable and approachable. Her classes are well-structured, but the exams are tough.
